skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Essence:</text> <text class='c_resource'>9</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>35%</text></br>Burst an enemy's blood, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.27 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Hemorrhage</text> has a <text class='c_number'>20%</text> chance to form a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

skills.name: Blood Surge
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>30</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>12%</text></br>Draw blood from enemies, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage, and expel a blood nova, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge's</text> nova damage is increased by <text class='c_number'>10%</text> per enemy drained, up to <text class='c_number'>50%</text>.

skills.name: Blood Mist
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[24*(1-(1-(cdr[sLevel])*.75)]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>[[24*(1-(1-(cdr[sLevel])*.75)]4]%</text></br>Disperse into a bloody mist, becoming <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds. Your Movement Speed is reduced by <text class='c_number'>20%</text> and you periodically deal <text class='c_number'>0.02</text> damage to enemies and Heal for <text class='c_number'>[[0.005 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))] * 100]%</text> of your Maximum Life <text class='c_number'>([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * [0.005 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))])|0|])</text> .

skills.name: Decrepify
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>10</text></br>Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> are Slowed by <text class='c_number'>[[1 - (Pow(1-(0.4), (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))))]*100]%</text> and deal <text class='c_number'>[[1 - (Pow(1-(0.2), 1 / (cdr[sLevel]))]*100]%</text> less damage for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds.

skills.name: Corpse Tendrils
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[11 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Veins burst out of a Corpse, Pulling in enemies, Stunning them for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds, and dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to them. Does not consume the Corpse.

skills.name: Iron Maiden
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>[Mod.GainMana ? 0 : 10]</text></br>Curse the target area. Enemies afflicted by <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text> take <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage each time they deal direct damage. Lasts <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: Enemies afflicted by your <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text> have a <text class='c_random'>35.27%</text> chance to be Stunned for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> second when they deal direct damage.
added_affixes: Enemies afflicted by your <text class='c_important'>Iron Maiden</text> have a <text class='c_random'>34.25%</text> chance to be Stunned for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> second when they deal direct damage.

equipment.name: Doom Armor
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.74%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>44.61%</text>.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: Walking near a Corpse automatically activates an equipped <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> Skill every second, dealing <text class='c_random'>34%</text> reduced damage.

equipment.name: Circle
base_affixes: Skeletal Mages Inherit +6.3% of Your Thorns
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge’s</text> nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing <text class='c_random'>79.48%</text> less damage.

equipment.name: Temerity
base_affixes: Effects that Heal you beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> Life grant you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> up to <text class='c_random'>61.86%</text> of your Maximum Life that lasts for <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a 5% Chance to Heal +0.41 Life

equipment.name: Necklace
base_affixes: +(2) Rank of the Tides of Blood Passive
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Sacrifice</text> bonuses are increased by <text class='c_random'>24.94%</text>.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: Critical Strikes and all subsequent damage within <text class='c_random'>2.56</text> seconds is absorbed by your target. Then, the absorbed damage erupts onto surrounding enemies. Stored damage is increased by <text class='c_number'>11%</text> per second.

equipment.name: Loop
base_affixes: Skeletal Mages Inherit +5.4% of Your Thorns
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>36</text> of your Primary Resource for every <text class='c_number'>37.5%</text> of your Life that you Heal.

equipment.name: Bone Wand
strikethrough_affixes: +20.25% Damage to Affected By Shadow Damage Over Time Enemies
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Sacrifice</text> bonuses are increased by <text class='c_random'>34.25%</text>.

equipment.name: Bone Shield
strikethrough_affixes: Every <text class='c_number'>12</text> seconds, your Cold Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals <text class='c_random'>1.14</text> Cold damage and continuously <text class='c_important'><u>Chills</u></text> enemies for <text class='c_number'>12%</text> over <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>2.01</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>45</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Gauntlets
added_affixes: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond <text class='c_number'>150%</text> grants you <text class='c_number'>0.75%</text> bonus <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> damage on your next <text class='c_important'><u>Overpowering</u></text> attack, up to a <text class='c_random'>61.35%</text> bonus.

equipment.name: Warlord Greathelm
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.18</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: When at least <text class='c_number'>4</text> enemies are near you, gain an aura that automatically curses surrounding enemies with <text class='c_important'>Decrepify</text> for <text class='c_random'>7</text> seconds.
